_sText:
**AIM_KARGO** BY UNREAL Designed for competitive gaming, the map is result of a strong desire to create an interactive environment for the player, where players are not only making a difference. Offering a reasonable level of detail, cranes carry bulky items that can make a difference during a round, they will cross between the player and his target adding an extra factor to the game. That is what the map focuses on, and its something that I love to do. Created for the mappingbase.de mapping contest sponsored by BFHosting.com and ESL.eu. _Sorry! The screenshots don't show some of the detail, due to being overlays and they don't appear because I was using a CFG._ This is the second time I do this kind of map, the first one being [awp_station](http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/152741 "awp_station").
**Map features:**
- Lightning - Interectative environment - Custom radar - Wallbangs possible - Custom textures - 64 Spawnpoints - Custom precipitation particles - ESL / BFHosting / MappingBase adverts (required for the contest) - Many others!
I couldn't decide whether to leave it as an AIM map or AWP map, so I made two versions for people who don't prefer one to other as well. I wanna thank everyone who suported me on this project and mappingbase for hosting this contest. If you plan on running this map on a Deathmatch server, please consider having the AWP version rather then the AIM version as its cleaner (no droped weapons). Feel free to download, comment & rate the map.
